snippet: Representative Justin Amash of Michigan is among the cadre of young, libertarian-leaning Republican House members who have repeatedly hijacked the party’s agenda.
abstract: Rep Justin Amash of Michigan is among cadre of young, libertarian-leaning House Republicans who have repeatedly hijacked their party's agenda, frustrating Republicans and Democrats alike; group, elected in Tea Party wave in 2010, has disrupted already unruly party on issues like health care, government surveillance and Syria.
lead_paragraph: Representative Justin Amash of Michigan is among the cadre of young, libertarian-leaning Republican House members who have repeatedly hijacked the party’s agenda.

headline.main: Newcomers Challenge Leadership in the House
headline.print_headline: Newcomers Challenge Leadership In the House
